c. If the product is different from the Order delivered. Products for return or refund shall be returned in its original condition, quantity and packaging as it first delivered to customer together with proof of purchase.

Currently we provide shipping to Malaysia only. Below are the delivery methods:

Free delivery within East Malaysia is applicable for orders of RM150 and above, only for the first 3kg. Every subsequent kg will be charged RM6.
Order will be delivered by using GDex and City-Link.
Changes on addresses are not allowed once order has been process.

Exchange, Return & Refund Policy
Exchange/Return/Refund of Products can be arranged under the following reasons:
a. If the products delivered is in damaged or defective condition; or
b. If the products is near expiry or expired; or
c. If the product is different from the Order delivered. Products for return or refund shall be returned in its original condition, quantity and packaging as it first delivered to customer together with proof of purchase.

For more details, kindly refer to this https://www.watsons.com.my/return-exchange

 Shipping Policy
Currently we provide shipping to Malaysia only. Below are the delivery methods:
Home Delivery to West & East Malaysia

Free delivery within East Malaysia is applicable for orders of RM150 and above, only for the first 3kg. Every subsequent kg will be charged RM6.
Order will be delivered by using GDex and City-Link.
Changes on addresses are not allowed once order has been process.

Exchange, Return & Refund Policy
Exchange/Return/Refund of Products can be arranged under the following reasons:
a. If the products delivered is in damaged or defective condition; or
b. If the products is near expiry or expired; or
c. If the product is different from the Order delivered. Products for return or refund shall be returned in its original condition, quantity and packaging as it first delivered to customer together with proof of purchase.

For more details, kindly refer to this https://www.watsons.com.my/return-exchange

c. If the product is different from the Order delivered. Products for return or refund shall be returned in its original condition, quantity and packaging as it first delivered to customer together with proof of purchase.

Description
Three Major Advantages: 1. The triple combination of mussel protein, type III collagen, and fibronectin directly addresses the root cause of sensitivity, repairing skin damage from the surface to the core, strengthening skin structure, and freeing skin from sensitivity while making it firm, elastic, and supple. 2. Patent-Backed Formulas-Pure natural marine mussel extract rapidly forms a microscopic, net-like biological scaffold, exhibiting remarkable repair capabilities. Recombinant type III collagen, highly homologous to human collagen sequences, promotes collagen regeneration, repairs damaged skin, and strengthens the skin barrier. Fibronectin, integrated with bio-transdermal peptide technology, reinforces and stabilizes skin structure. Purslane extract, rich in unique bioactive amino acids, soothes skin and inhibits redness and swelling. 3. Invisible Protective Barrier Technology-Forms a biological barrier on the skin's surface, preventing the entry of harmful substances and microorganisms while enhancing skin's hydration retention capabilities, minimizing water loss.
